name: Resisting Cognitive Manipulation
description: Building the ability to detect and neutralize thought manipulation before it takes hold.

cards.title: Neutralizing Cognitive Hijacking
cards.description: Preventing PSNs from inserting false narratives into your thought process.
bulletpoints: Interrupting repetitive messaging patterns prevents subconscious persuasion.
Analyzing the logical structure of arguments helps detect deceptive rhetoric.
Practicing self-questioning prevents unconscious acceptance of implanted thoughts.

cards.title: Deconstructing Manipulative Narratives
cards.description: Dismantling propaganda, gaslighting, and coercive persuasion techniques.
bulletpoints: Identifying linguistic distortions reveals the hidden intent behind manipulative messaging.
Breaking down arguments into fundamental claims helps expose contradictions.
Recognizing emotional appeals as tools of control allows for logical counteraction.

cards.title: Psychological Self-Regulation Under Pressure
cards.description: Maintaining clear thinking and composure in high-stakes psychological battles.
bulletpoints: Slowing down responses prevents PSNs from dictating the pace of the exchange.
Using mental anchoring techniques preserves logical thought patterns under stress.
Recognizing physiological stress signals allows for preemptive emotional control.
